description: Migrate a VMK interface from VSS to VDS

username.description: The username of the vSphere vCenter.

current_switch_name.description: Switch VMK interface is currently on

migrate_portgroup_name.description: Portgroup name to migrate VMK interface to

validate_certs.description: Allows connection when SSL certificates are not valid. Set to false when certificates are not trusted.

hostname.description: The hostname or IP address of the vSphere vCenter.

password.description: The password of the vSphere vCenter.

current_portgroup_name.description: Portgroup name VMK interface is currently on

migrate_switch_name.description: Switch name to migrate VMK interface to
